anime.name: Happy Lucky Bikkuriman
anime.info: 祝 ハピ☆ラキ ビックリマン
#1: "祝（ハピラキ）！ビックリマン [Happy Lucky Bikkuriman]" by Hideaki Takatori
#1: "あっちの世界はほっちっち [Atchi no Sekai wa Hotchitchi]" by Mayumi Tanaka, Jouji Yanami, Youko Soumi, and Reiko Kiuchi
ＢＳ朝日 - ハピラキ！ビックリマン

episode.title: tenshi to akuma de monmontaimu! ore gaarukeba rakki niataru!!
gekikara ahhi! genki vs yamato ōji!!
koishi te perori ~ n! ura setsu gomen no urufurai!!
kirari ~ n ii shigoto! suketto otoko jakku sanjō!!
futotta kimi ha utsukushi i! shirayuki no anchidaietto!!
jukunen rikon ha osoroshi ~! mukuchi de raburi ~?! ushi jaku ten ko!!
mayoi michi ku ~ nekune! jūjika hato ha don soko rakki!!
biki komotta jaku kami ko! aribaba, gaga ~ n to dai mōsō!!
erimakki no arashi! nakayoshi shiroro de dai genka!?
arie nasshingu! teki ha ryūgūjō no ippon tsuri mikado!!
koi no ra. ra. ra. ra ~ men gen sato! ore tachiha chashu janai!!
kanpekki ~ vs mu ~ dadayo! jiero, o mae hao nimotsu da!!
azabu tsu! serebu tsu!! negateibu tsu!!!3 nin no jūjika tenshi
yamato taihen mi! pi ~ kun, otona ha kirai de chu!!
a ~ chisu shima de kotobukki! jiero & nero, yurusa rezaru ai...
raburabu muhha ~! ro kami fuddo ha aitsu ni muchū!!
pyopyo ~ n tomaruwakari! korega " hikari den " no tatakai?!
nuhahahatsu to innen taiketsu! supazeusu vs supadebiru!!
naniwabushi dayo dan sanha! gokuraku massaji atsu. u ~~ n!!
genki no osu sakebi! makoto hiiiiroooo tanjō o tsu!!
abuna i monmon!! kaisan! nyannyanchiaridazu
batoru. ninniku. rowaiyaru! puroresu ai no manjigatame me!!
kun ha hō eni shine ruka?! i. ke. na. i urufutorappu!!
wanwan. wakingupua ~! kyūryō kaese hanasaki ka sennin!!
koi no datenshi toraianguru! mō modore nai... mashō no hanazono!!
shirubaeiji. za. gureto! karakuri ninjutsu dai kassen!!
mashingan. berabe ~ ra! usshi ~ ga kataru jaku kami ko no himitsu!!
dai sorai tō no nazo! sutton to saikyō no akuma tōjō?!
7 nin no maemukki! sukue itoshi no fenikkusu sama aatsu!!
onsen porori de nikkori ~!? feni sama kangei! yu kemuri baraetei
konto da rakugo da manzai da! sandai geinin, matoba saidai no ketsu warai sen!!
onsen purofaira no hi jikenbo! kie ta feni sama, gyakuten no torikku!!
saraba onsen no hibi... bura ~ tsu to gurume hikyō tabi
ka ~ n tto ima koso kagayakki! fukkatsu!! heddorokoko sama
panchi de nyao ~ n! rabunori fi ~ ringu daisakusen!!
dorimujanbooyaji! giratsu to mise ru manatsu no mote waza!!
akuma ga kita rite ge ~ rogero! muttsu haka no noroi ja ~ tsu!!
gin ta ichi saigo no misuteri! kono ketsumatsu dakeha hanashi takunakatta...
satsueijo ha rodosho ~ kku! nayame ru kyoshō no tengoku to jigoku!!
saraba uruwashi no nerokuin... ai no 3 baka tachi!!
kumori nochi habatakki?! tsubasa no ore ta himihimi...
tsuinisorotta orusuta! tome tekureruna mashirodo!!
rabu uozu saizensen! tsumibukaki haitoku no jūjika!!
fainaru i. akuma no hangekki! debiru kanzenfukkatsu!!
fainaru ii. tenshi no shogekki! saraba zeusu sama!!
fainaru iii. o mamori hapirakki! matobayori ai wokomete...

anime.news: Anime to Be Showcased at MIPCOM Media Industry Event
